channel.title: xorg on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in xorg on Paul Cutler

item.title: T61 Lockups Follow-up
item.description: Thanks to zdz for posting a comment on my T61 Lockups post. He was absolutely right – it was an Intel / xorg driver issue causing the lockups. A big shout out to doniphon for updating and testing Xorg at the 20/20 Conference last week. I’m running the latest Xorg on my T61, and the lock-ups are gone! And I’m still loving the T61. Great Linux support, good form factor, and a great value.
